verses.name: Psalms 116:7
verses.text: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the Lord hath dealt bountifully with thee.

verses.name: Psalms 116:8
verses.text: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.

verses.name: Psalms 116:9
verses.text: I will walk before the Lord in the land of the living.

verses.name: Psalms 116:10
verses.text: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

verses.name: Psalms 116:11
verses.text: I said in my haste, All men are liars.

verses.name: Psalms 116:12
verses.text: What shall I render unto the Lord for all his benefits toward me?

verses.name: Psalms 116:13
verses.text: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the Lord.
